reviewText: We have been hooked on this great series of mysteries from Sicily!  His personality and those of his subordinates in addition to the native population are great entertainment and a look into their culture.Our only regret is that there are only 22 episodes!
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 16-18

reviewText: The three episodes include:- Track of Sand- Wings of the Sphinx- August heat,all as good as the previous episodes.I ordered from Movie Mars and the discs are not defective in any way.
summary: THE DISCS I RECEIVED ARE NOT DEFECTIVE
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 16-18

reviewText: I always enjoy his interaction with his staff, most of all Fazio, and the way he reads the women he has to deal with. He really cares for his staff.
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 16-18

reviewText: Montalbano is always Montalbano; meaning that he is better in my estimation than any other current fictional detective.  He and his crew work, and banter, with each other like real life people.  And, there is a great deal of humor present, even in serious criminal investigations -- just as there is in every day police work.
summary: There is no one as good as Montalbano
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 16-18

reviewText: As usual, Montalbano's investigations are interesting and full of drama. Nonetheless, the outcome of one of the chapters is quite predictable; that's why I'm giving a 4 star instead of a 5. However, I'm a big fan of detective Montalbano as well as of Andrea Camillieri's novels.
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 16-18

reviewText: The blending of the cast and story is excellent. The  actors both featured and supporting are outstanding. Don't miss it.
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 16-18
